name: TIE Sentry Ships (V)
Lore: 'Several TIEs were assigned to patrol Cloud City prior to the Imperial occupation of Bespin. Their instructions were to herd any vessels attempting to escape toward the Executor.',
Text: 'USED: If you just drew a unique (•) Imperial starship for destiny, take that starship into hand to cancel and redraw the destiny.LOST: Use 3 Force to retrieve a unique (•) Imperial starship into hand.(Original Concept by Michael Erisman - PC Volunteer Award 2008)',
